channel.title: Project Insanity - Hyperion Game Engine
channel.description:
Hey, is there anyway of making my cache external so its not in the client, then making it auto download when you run the client because im sick to death of having to give people a massive client folder just so they can play.
Mabye suggest a topic which shows you how to do this or post below.
Thanks, i hope theres someone out there.

item.title: Project Insanity - Hyperion Game Engine
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

If it helps mine is in CacheDownloader.java and just find:

private final int VERSION = 10; private String cacheLink = "https://dl.dropbox.com/s/1l023nfbr4wpzx3/CACHE HERE.zip";

and replace the link with wherever you want the client to download the cache from when it’s first ran…

Sorry if this doesn’t help.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity - Hyperion Game Engine
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Yes… 90% of servers are set up like that.
Search “PI Webclient Tutorial”
Should get you some results.

Read full topic
